content: to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 48 double_crochet join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet work back and make 1dc into the pr evious st *skip st 1dc into the next st 1dc back into the skip st * repeat from *to* 22 more times join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 24 crdc join in the double_crochet to the left in any cr double_crochet ch2 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc into the previous st work 1 cr double_crochet into each of the cr double_crochet s from round 14 join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends after round 17 stitch count 24 crdc join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 47sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 48 double_crochet ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 2sts *5trc bobble in the next st 1dc into each of the next 3sts * repeat from *to* 10 more times 5trc bobble in the last st join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a sl st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12 x 5 treble_crochet bobbles 36dc 6 join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 47sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 48 double_crochet note if you feel that the twiddle muff is becoming a bit long you can decrease the amou nt of rounds worked here ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 47sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends after you have completed round 26 stitch count 48 double_crochet join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 47sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 48 double_crochet note don t worry too much about where your bobbles fall this just adds to the texture of the twiddle muff ch2 t his counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 2sts *5trc bobble in the next st 1dc into each of the next 3sts * repeat from *to* 10 more times 5trc bobble in the last st join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12 x 5 treble_crochet bobbles 36dc bobbles 36dc join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 47sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 48 double_crochet 7
